properties.description: The largest community centre in Launceston. We offer plenty of space to come and relax in our community cafe, Cafe Avodah.

properties.description: We cater from everyone and have toys for children, magazines, books and puzzles. A warm welcome fromThe Foodbank and Launceston Community Church providing a friendly space next to the Foodbank Charity Shop. Everyone welcome... bring along your craft projects, knitting and art materials. Enjoy free hot drinks, soup and toasties.
